channel.title: Hyperion Error
channel.description:
Well, I was running Hyperion through IDE and I got this error:
[code] Mar 17, 2012 11:36:39 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 17, 2012 11:36:44 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Mar 17, 2012 11:36:44 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:251) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:48) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.registerHandles(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:523) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.access$200(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:65) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor$Acceptor.run(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:407) at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservingRunnable.java:64) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Hyperion Error
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Address already in use: bind

That means youâ€™re already hosting the server in another console. Make sure you terminate all java applications via eclipse and restart.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Error
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well, I was running Hyperion through IDE and I got this error:

Mar 17, 2012 11:36:39 AM org.hyperion.Server main
INFO: Starting Hyperion...
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43595...
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 8080...
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start
INFO: Ready
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:43 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loading definitions...
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:44 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43594...
Mar 17, 2012 11:36:44 AM org.hyperion.Server main
SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion.
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind
	at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)
	at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source)
	at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:251)
	at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:48)
	at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.registerHandles(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:523)
	at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.access$200(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:65)
	at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor$Acceptor.run(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:407)
	at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservingRunnable.java:64)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
